chapters.name: Nutrition in Plants
learning_outcomes: Explains photosynthesis in simple terms.
Differentiates between various modes of plant nutrition.

chapters.name: Nutrition in Animals
key_topics: Human digestive system organs and functions
learning_outcomes: Labels human digestive system and explains main functions.
Describes digestion in at least one non-human organism.

chapters.name: Fibre to Fabric
key_topics: Wool: animals, shearing, cleaning and spinning
Health and safety in fibre production
learning_outcomes: Describes steps of wool and silk production.
Appreciates concerns of workers involved in fibre industries.

chapters.name: Heat
learning_outcomes: Uses clinical and laboratory thermometers correctly.
Explains everyday examples of conduction, convection and radiation.

chapters.name: Acids, Bases and Salts
key_topics: Acidic and basic substances around us
learning_outcomes: Identifies household substances as acidic or basic using indicators.
Explains simple neutralisation applications (indigestion, soil treatment).

chapters.name: Physical and Chemical Changes
learning_outcomes: Classifies observed changes as physical or chemical.
Describes conditions that speed up rusting.

chapters.name: Weather, Climate and Adaptations of Animals to Climate
key_topics: Adaptations of animals to polar and tropical climates
learning_outcomes: Differentiates between weather and climate.
Relates animal adaptations to specific climates.

chapters.name: Winds, Storms and Cyclones
learning_outcomes: Explains relation between air pressure and wind.
Lists safety measures during cyclones and heavy storms.

chapters.name: Soil
learning_outcomes: Draws a labelled diagram of soil profile.
Explains reasons and remedies for soil erosion.

chapters.name: Respiration in Organisms
learning_outcomes: Differentiates between breathing and respiration.
Describes human respiratory system in brief.

chapters.name: Transportation in Animals and Plants
key_topics: Transport of water and minerals in plants
learning_outcomes: Identifies main components of circulatory system.
Explains role of xylem and phloem in plants.

chapters.name: Reproduction in Plants
learning_outcomes: Describes at least two methods of asexual reproduction in plants.
Explains pollination and seed formation in simple terms.

chapters.name: Motion and Time
learning_outcomes: Calculates speed for uniform motion using distance and time.
Differentiates between uniform and non-uniform motion.

chapters.name: Electric Current and its Effects
learning_outcomes: Explains uses of heating effect of current (bulb, heater).
Describes basic idea of electromagnet.

chapters.name: Light
learning_outcomes: Draws ray diagrams for image in plane mirror.
Explains everyday phenomena involving reflection.

chapters.name: Water: A Precious Resource
learning_outcomes: Discusses causes of water scarcity in local context.
Suggests measures to conserve water at community level.

chapters.name: Forests: Our Lifeline
key_topics: Interdependence of plants, animals and microbes
learning_outcomes: Explains forest as a system of many interdependent parts.
Recognises impact of deforestation on environment.

chapters.name: Wastewater Story
learning_outcomes: Describes basic steps in wastewater treatment.
Relates individual actions to sanitation and health.
